TEXT.German: Erneuter Gruß, [CT_NAME]. Wie immer bringt Ihr die Sonne in unser Land. Was können die Malakim für Euch tun?
TEXT.Italian: Greetings again, [CT_NAME]. As ever, your presence brings light to our lands. What can the Malakim do for you?
TEXT.Spanish: Saludos de nuevo, [CT_NAME]. Como siempre, vuestra presencia trae luz a nuestras tierras. ¿Qué podemos hacer los Malakim por vos?

TEXT.English: Hmm it seems a shadow is cast in this room, blocking out the sun. I wonder what it will take for it to go away.
TEXT.French: Hmm... Il semble qu'une ombre est projetée dans cette pièce, obstruant le soleil. Je me demande ce qu'il faudrait pour la faire partir.
TEXT.German: Hmmm... es scheint, ein Schatten legt sich über diesen Raum und verdeckt die Sonne. Ich frage mich, was nötig ist, damit er verschwindet.
TEXT.Italian: Hmm it seems a shadow is cast in this room, blocking out the sun. I wonder what it will take for it to go away.
TEXT.Spanish: Hmm... parece que se ha convocado una sombra en esta habitación, tapando el sol. Espero que éste se encargue de ella y haga que se vaya.

TEXT.English: Sounds like a good deal, I would be foolish to turn it down.
TEXT.French: Cela me semble être un bon marché, je serais bien fou de le refuser
TEXT.German: Das hört sich nach einem guten Handel an. Ich wäre töricht abzulehnen.
TEXT.Italian: Sounds like a good deal, I would be foolish to turn it down.
TEXT.Spanish: Parece un buen trato, sería un idiota si lo rechazara.

TEXT.English: These dark desires shall lead you to your destruction.
TEXT.French: Ces noirs désirs vous conduiront à votre destruction.
TEXT.German: Diese dunklen Gelüste werden schließlich zu Eurer Vernichtung führen.
TEXT.Italian: These dark desires shall lead you to your destruction.
TEXT.Spanish: Estos deseos oscuros os llevarán a vuestra destrucción.

TEXT.English: Sorry, friend, but that cannot be done at the moment. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.French: Désolé mon ami, mais cela ne peut être fait pour l'instant. Peut être à un autre moment.
TEXT.German: Entschuldigt, Freund, doch das kann zur Zeit nicht getan werden. Vielleicht ein andermal.
TEXT.Italian: Sorry, friend, but that cannot be done at the moment. Perhaps another time.
TEXT.Spanish: Lo siento, amigo, pero no podemos llevarlo a cabo en este momento. Quizá la próxima vez.

TEXT.English: Please stop wasting our time. We would get no benefit from such a deal.
TEXT.French: S'il vous plaît, ne nous faites pas perdre notre temps avec cette proposition. Nous n'avons rien à y gagner.
TEXT.German: Verschwendet bitte nicht unsere Zeit. Von solcher Art Vertrag haben wir nichts.
TEXT.Italian: Please stop wasting our time. We would get no benefit from such a deal.
TEXT.Spanish: Por favor, dejad de malgastar nuestro tiempo. No obtendríamos ningún beneficio de un trato como ese.

TEXT.English: The time has come for this horrible war to end. There's nothing to gain for either of us, further hostilities will just lead to further destruction, until darkness and death have engulfed our lands completely. I urge you to reconsider your position, and to agree to cease hostilities once and for all.
TEXT.French: Le temps est venu pour cette horrible guerre de se terminer. Aucun de nous n'a quoi que ce soit à y gagner, plus d'hostilités conduiront seulement à plus de destruction, jusqu'à ce que l'obscurité et la mort aient totalement recouvert nos terres. Je vous somme de reconsidérer votre position, et d'accepter de cesser les hostilités une bonne fois pour toute.
TEXT.German: Die Zeit ist gekommen, diesen schrecklichen Krieg zu beenden. Es gibt für keinen von uns etwas zu gewinnen, weitere Kampfhandlungen führen nur zu weiterer Zerstörung, bis unsere Länder vollkommen in Dunkelheit und Tod gehüllt sein werden. Ich bitte Euch eindringlichst, Eure Position zu überdenken und zuzustimmen, die Kampfhandlungen ein für alle mal zu beenden.
TEXT.Italian: The time has come for this horrible war to end. There's nothing to gain for either of us, further hostilities will just lead to further destruction, until darkness and death have engulfed our lands completely. I urge you to reconsider your position, and to agree to cease hostilities once and for all.
TEXT.Spanish: El tiempo para que esta horrible guerra termine ha llegado. No hay nada que ganar para ninguno de los dos, más hostilidades sólo conducirán a más destrucción, hasta que la oscuridad y la muerte cubran por completo nuestras tierras. Os animo a que reconsideréis vuestra posición, y accedáis al cese de las hostilidades de una vez por todas.

TEXT.English: I am most grateful.
TEXT.French: Je vous en suis très reconnaissant.
TEXT.German: Ich bin außerordentlich dankbar.
TEXT.Italian: I am most grateful.
TEXT.Spanish: Os doy las gracias.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], it's about time you handed this over to us. I assure you we'll put it to good use.
TEXT.French: Il est temps que vous nous remettiez ceci, [CT_NAME]. Je vous assure que nous en ferons bon usage.
TEXT.German: [CT_NAME], es ist an der Zeit, uns dies auszuhändigen. Seid versichert, dass es bei uns gut aufgehoben ist.
TEXT.Italian: [CT_NAME], it's about time you handed this over to us. I assure you we'll put it to good use.
TEXT.Spanish: [CT_NAME], es hora de que nos déis esto. Os aseguro que le daremos buen uso.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], I wonder if we could persuade you to part with this. Our gratitude will be great.
TEXT.French: [CT_NAME], je me demande si nous pouvons vous persuader de partager ceci. Notre gratitude sera grande.
TEXT.German: [CT_NAME], ich frage mich, ob wir Euch überzeugen könnten, Euch davon zu trennen? Unser Dank wäre übergroß.
TEXT.Italian: [CT_NAME], I wonder if we could persuade you to part with this. Our gratitude will be great.
TEXT.Spanish: [CT_NAME], me pregunto se podríamos persuadiros de que contribuyérais con esto. Os lo agradeceremos enormemente.

TEXT.English: Please, the Malakim are in dire need. Can you help us?
TEXT.French: Par pitié, les Malakims sont dans une profonde misère. Pouvez-vous nous aider ?
TEXT.German: Bitte, die Malakim sind in arger Bedrängnis. Könnt Ihr uns helfen?
TEXT.Italian: Please, the Malakim are in dire need. Can you help us?
TEXT.Spanish: Por favor, los Malakim sufrimos una gran necesidad. ¿Podeis ayudarnos?

TEXT.English: You can try to hide your secrets from us, but dawn has come and the light shall reveal all.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez essayer de nous cacher vos secrets, mais l'aube est venue et la lumière révèlera tout.
TEXT.German: Versucht Ihr auch Geheimnisse in Dunkelheit zu hüllen, Morgenröte bringt das Licht, sie zu offenbaren.
TEXT.Italian: You can try to hide your secrets from us, but dawn has come and the light shall reveal all.
TEXT.Spanish: Podéis intertar esconder vuestros secretos de nosotros, pero el alba ha llegado y la luz lo revelará todo.

TEXT.English: "I am but the servant, dark one. Lugus shall bring the end to you."
TEXT.French: "Je ne suis que l'homme de main, sombre créature. Lugus vous apportera la fin."
TEXT.German: "Ich bin nur der Diener, Finsterer. Lugus wird Euer Ende bereiten."
TEXT.Italian: "I am but the servant, dark one. Lugus shall bring the end to you."
TEXT.Spanish: "I am but the servant, dark one. Lugus shall bring the end to you."

TEXT.English: Every empire is built on the bones of weaker, unworthy beings. It is now time I add yours to the Malakim empire.
TEXT.French: Chaque empire est bâti sur les os d'êtres faibles et indignes. Il est maintenant temps que j'ajoute les votres à l'empire Malakim.
TEXT.German: Every empire is built on the bones of weaker, unworthy men. It is now time I add yours to the Malakim empire.
TEXT.Italian: Every empire is built on the bones of weaker, unworthy men. It is now time I add yours to the Malakim empire.
TEXT.Spanish: Every empire is built on the bones of weaker, unworthy men. It is now time I add yours to the Malakim empire.

TEXT.English: We are not in need of your protection anymore, although you may be in need of ours soon.
TEXT.French: Nous n'avons plus guère besoin de votre protection, bien que vous auriez probablement besoin de la nôtre très bientôt.
TEXT.German: We are not in need of your protection anymore, although you may be in need of ours soon.
TEXT.Italian: We are not in need of your protection anymore, although you may be in need of ours soon.
TEXT.Spanish: We are not in need of your protection anymore, although you may be in need of ours soon.

TEXT.English: Even the mightiest of empires can experience harsh times. Take advantage of this temporary opportuny, but know that with my guidance, the Malakim shall always rise again.
TEXT.French: Mêmes les plus grands empires peuvent connaître des temps ardus. Tirez parti de cette opportunité temporaire, mais gardez en tête que sous ma direction, les Malakims s'élèveront inévitablement à nouveau.
TEXT.German: Even the mightiest of empires can experience harsh times. Take advantage of this opportuny, but know that with my guidance, the Malakim shall always rise again.
TEXT.Italian: Even the mightiest of empires can experience harsh times. Take advantage of this opportuny, but know that with my guidance, the Malakim shall always rise again.
TEXT.Spanish: Even the mightiest of empires can experience harsh times. Take advantage of this opportuny, but know that with my guidance, the Malakim shall always rise again.

TEXT.English: Welcome to my palace! Gaze upon the splendors of my empire, and know that it was by my hand that all you behold was made possible.
TEXT.French: Je vous souhaite la bienvenue dans mon palais ! Contemplez les splendeurs de mon empire, et sachez que c'est de ma main que tout ce que vous contemplez a été rendu possible.
TEXT.German: Welcome to my palace! Gaze upon the splendors of my empire, and know that it was by my hand that all you behold was made possible.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome to my palace! Gaze upon the splendors of my empire, and know that it was by my hand that all you behold was made possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome to my palace! Gaze upon the splendors of my empire, and know that it was by my hand that all you behold was made possible.

TEXT.English: Begone, impudent fool, or I shall hurl you from this place myself.
TEXT.French: Partez, imbécile impudent, ou je vous expulserai de cet endroit moi-même.
TEXT.German: Begone, impudent fool, or I shall hurl you from this place myself.
TEXT.Italian: Begone, impudent fool, or I shall hurl you from this place myself.
TEXT.Spanish: Begone, impudent fool, or I shall hurl you from this place myself.

TEXT.English: Then we shall feast, as kin. Do not betray the trust I have put in you, and I shall return the favor.
TEXT.French: Dans ce cas nous festoierons, en semblables. Ne trahissez pas la confiance que j'ai placée en vous, et je vous rendrai la faveur.
TEXT.German: Then we shall feast, as kin. Do not betray the trust I have put in you, and I shall return the favor.
TEXT.Italian: Then we shall feast, as kin. Do not betray the trust I have put in you, and I shall return the favor.
TEXT.Spanish: Then we shall feast, as kin. Do not betray the trust I have put in you, and I shall return the favor.

TEXT.English: Have you come to surrender at last?
TEXT.French: Venez vous pour vous rendre enfin?
TEXT.German: Have you come to surrender at last?
TEXT.Italian: Have you come to surrender at last?
TEXT.Spanish: Have you come to surrender at last?

TEXT.English: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, ami des Malakims. Mes bénédictions sur vous et vos semblables.
TEXT.German: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.Spanish: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.

TEXT.English: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, ami des Malakims. Mes bénédictions sur vous et vos semblables.
TEXT.German: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.
TEXT.Spanish: Greetings, friend of the Malakim. Blessings upon you and your kin.

TEXT.English: Greetings, what have you brought for us today?
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, qu'apportez vous for nous aujourd'hui?
TEXT.German: Greetings, what have you brought for us today?
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, what have you brought for us today?
TEXT.Spanish: Greetings, what have you brought for us today?

TEXT.English: Speak.
TEXT.French: Parlez.
TEXT.German: Speak.
TEXT.Italian: Speak.
TEXT.Spanish: Speak.

TEXT.English: Speak.
TEXT.French: Parlez.
TEXT.German: Speak.
TEXT.Italian: Speak.
TEXT.Spanish: Speak.

TEXT.English: Speak, I am curious to see what you can bring to the Malakim.
TEXT.French: Parlez, je suis curieux de voir ce que vous pouvez apporter aux Malakims.
TEXT.German: Speak, I am curious to see what you can bring to the Malakim.
TEXT.Italian: Speak, I am curious to see what you can bring to the Malakim.
TEXT.Spanish: Speak, I am curious to see what you can bring to the Malakim.

TEXT.English: We certainly have something to gain from that. I accept your terms.
TEXT.French: Il est certains que nous avons à gagner de ceci. J'accepte vos termes.
TEXT.German: We certainly have something to gain from that. I accept your terms.
TEXT.Italian: We certainly have something to gain from that. I accept your terms.
TEXT.Spanish: We certainly have something to gain from that. I accept your terms.

TEXT.English: This empire would have never risen to the greatness everyone can gaze upon today if I accepted terms like these.
TEXT.French: Cette empire n'aurait jamais atteint la grandeur que tous peuvent contempler aujourd'hui si j'acceptais de tels termes.
TEXT.German: This empire would have never risen to the greatness everyone can gaze upon today if I accepted terms like these.
TEXT.Italian: This empire would have never risen to the greatness everyone can gaze upon today if I accepted terms like these.
TEXT.Spanish: This empire would have never risen to the greatness everyone can gaze upon today if I accepted terms like these.

TEXT.English: This empire have risen from the blood of those who would disrespect us, not from terms like these. You would do better to remember it.
TEXT.French: Cet empire s'est élevé par le sang de ceux qui nous manquaient de respect, pas par des termes comme ceux-ci. Vous feriez mieux de vous en souvenir.
TEXT.German: This empire have risen from the blood of those who would disrespect us, not from terms like these. You would do better to remember it.
TEXT.Italian: This empire have risen from the blood of those who would disrespect us, not from terms like these. You would do better to remember it.
TEXT.Spanish: This empire have risen from the blood of those who would disrespect us, not from terms like these. You would do better to remember it.

TEXT.English: Blessings upon you, know that friends of the Malakim have even more to gain as long as they remain loyal.
TEXT.French: Mes bénédictions sur vous, sachez que les amis des Malakims ont encore plus à gagner tant qu'ils restent loyaux.
TEXT.German: Blessings upon you, know that friends of the Malakim have even more to gain as long as they remain loyal.
TEXT.Italian: Blessings upon you, know that friends of the Malakim have even more to gain as long as they remain loyal.
TEXT.Spanish: Blessings upon you, know that friends of the Malakim have even more to gain as long as they remain loyal.

TEXT.English: I have done well keeping you around, let us hope you can bring more to the Malakim in the future.
TEXT.French: J'ai bien fais de vous épargner jusque-là, espérons que vous ayez plus encore à apporter aux Malakims dans le futur.
TEXT.German: I have done well keeping you around, let us hope you can bring more to the Malakim in the future.
TEXT.Italian: I have done well keeping you around, let us hope you can bring more to the Malakim in the future.
TEXT.Spanish: I have done well keeping you around, let us hope you can bring more to the Malakim in the future.

TEXT.English: Disappointing, I hope you will come around in the near future.
TEXT.French: C'est décevant, j'espère que vous changerais d'avis dans un futur proche.
TEXT.German: Disappointing, I hope you will come around in the near future.
TEXT.Italian: Disappointing, I hope you will come around in the near future.
TEXT.Spanish: Disappointing, I hope you will come around in the near future.

TEXT.English: It matters not. When words fail, I know that I can always rely on our strength.
TEXT.French: Cela importe peu. Quand les mots échouent, je sais que je peux toujours compter sur notre force.
TEXT.German: It matters not. When words fail, I know that I can always rely on our strength.
TEXT.Italian: It matters not. When words fail, I know that I can always rely on our strength.
TEXT.Spanish: It matters not. When words fail, I know that I can always rely on our strength.

TEXT.English: This would certainly make it more acceptable to us.
TEXT.French: Cela devrait être plus acceptable pour nous.
TEXT.German: This would certainly make it more acceptable to us.
TEXT.Italian: This would certainly make it more acceptable to us.
TEXT.Spanish: This would certainly make it more acceptable to us.

TEXT.English: I am sorry, but these terms are unacceptable to us.
TEXT.French: Je suis désolé, mais ces termes nous sont inacceptables.
TEXT.German: I am sorry, but these terms are unacceptable to us.
TEXT.Italian: I am sorry, but these terms are unacceptable to us.
TEXT.Spanish: I am sorry, but these terms are unacceptable to us.

TEXT.English: Do not waste my time if your measly "empire" has nothing of more value to offer to the Malakim.
TEXT.French: Ne gaspillez pas mon temps si votre pitoyable "empire" n'a rien de plus à offrir aux Malakims.
TEXT.German: Do not waste my time if your measly "empire" has nothing of more value to offer to the Malakim.
TEXT.Italian: Do not waste my time if your measly "empire" has nothing of more value to offer to the Malakim.
TEXT.Spanish: Do not waste my time if your measly "empire" has nothing of more value to offer to the Malakim.

TEXT.English: I offer you an opportunity not to get crushed by the sands of our deserts, the rest is up to you.
TEXT.French: Je vous offre une opportunité de ne pas vous faire écraser par les sables de nos déserts, le reste dépend de vous.
TEXT.German: I offer you an opportunity not to get crushed by the sands of our deserts, the rest is up to you.
TEXT.Italian: I offer you an opportunity not to get crushed by the sands of our deserts, the rest is up to you.
TEXT.Spanish: I offer you an opportunity not to get crushed by the sands of our deserts, the rest is up to you.

TEXT.English: You have something we need, friend of the Malakim. I certainly hope this compensation will suffice.
TEXT.French: Vous avez quelque chose dont nous avons besoin, ami des Malakim. J'espère que cette compensation sera suffisante.
TEXT.German: You have something we need, friend of the Malakim. I certainly hope this compensation will suffice.
TEXT.Italian: You have something we need, friend of the Malakim. I certainly hope this compensation will suffice.
TEXT.Spanish: You have something we need, friend of the Malakim. I certainly hope this compensation will suffice.

TEXT.English: I suggest you accept this offer. I certainly am a more generous negociator than my raiders.
TEXT.French: Je vous suggeste d'accepter cette offre. Je suis certainement un négociateur plus généreux que mes pillards.
TEXT.German: I suggest you accept this offer. I certainly am a more generous negociator than my raiders.
TEXT.Italian: I suggest you accept this offer. I certainly am a more generous negociator than my raiders.
TEXT.Spanish: I suggest you accept this offer. I certainly am a more generous negociator than my raiders.

TEXT.English: It is unfortunate, but this agreement does not benefit the Malakim as much as it used do, and so I must put an end to it.
TEXT.French: C'est regrettable, mais cet accord ne bénéficie plus autant aux Malakims que par le passé, et je dois donc y mettre fin.
TEXT.German: It is unfortunate, but this agreement does not benefit the Malakim as much as it used do, and so I must put an end to it.
TEXT.Italian: It is unfortunate, but this agreement does not benefit the Malakim as much as it used do, and so I must put an end to it.
TEXT.Spanish: It is unfortunate, but this agreement does not benefit the Malakim as much as it used do, and so I must put an end to it.

TEXT.English: I do not have to pay for what my raiders will soon bring me.
TEXT.French: Je n'ai pas à payer pour ce que mes pillards vont bientôt m'apporter.
TEXT.German: I do not have to pay for what my raiders will soon bring me.
TEXT.Italian: I do not have to pay for what my raiders will soon bring me.
TEXT.Spanish: I do not have to pay for what my raiders will soon bring me.

TEXT.English: You are reasonable. Blessings be upon you.
TEXT.French: Vous êtes raisonnable. Mes bénédictions sur vous.
TEXT.German: You are reasonable. Blessings be upon you.
TEXT.Italian: You are reasonable. Blessings be upon you.
TEXT.Spanish: You are reasonable. Blessings be upon you.

TEXT.English: Here are the currently have with the Malakim.
TEXT.French: Voici les accords que vous avez actuellement avec les Malakims.
TEXT.German: Here are the currently have with the Malakim.
TEXT.Italian: Here are the currently have with the Malakim.
TEXT.Spanish: Here are the currently have with the Malakim.

TEXT.English: As a friend of the Malakim, you can have this.
TEXT.French: En tant qu'allié des Malakims, vous pouvez avoir ceci.
TEXT.German: As a friend of the Malakim, you can have this.
TEXT.Italian: As a friend of the Malakim, you can have this.
TEXT.Spanish: As a friend of the Malakim, you can have this.

TEXT.English: If you need that, I suggest you acquire it by yourself. Our empire was not built on gifts.
TEXT.French: Si vous avez besoin de cela, je vous suggère de l'acquérir par vous-même. Notre empire ne s'est pas bâti sur des cadeaux.
TEXT.German: If you need that, I suggest you acquire it by yourself. Our empire was not built on gifts.
TEXT.Italian: If you need that, I suggest you acquire it by yourself. Our empire was not built on gifts.
TEXT.Spanish: If you need that, I suggest you acquire it by yourself. Our empire was not built on gifts.

TEXT.English: Take it. I hope you choke on it.
TEXT.French: Prenez cela. J'espère que vous vous étoufferez avec.
TEXT.German: Take it. I hope you choke on it.
TEXT.Italian: Take it. I hope you choke on it.
TEXT.Spanish: Take it. I hope you choke on it.

TEXT.English: I did not bend to elves. I did not bend to orcs. I did not bend to vampires. Who are you to think that I will bend to you?
TEXT.French: Je ne me suis pas plié aux elfes. Je ne me suis pas plié aux orcs. Je ne me suis pas plié aux vampires. Qui êtes vous pour pensez que je me plierez à vous?
TEXT.German: I did not bend to elves. I did not bend to orcs. I did not bend to vampires. Who are you to think that I will bend to you?
TEXT.Italian: I did not bend to elves. I did not bend to orcs. I did not bend to vampires. Who are you to think that I will bend to you?
TEXT.Spanish: I did not bend to elves. I did not bend to orcs. I did not bend to vampires. Who are you to think that I will bend to you?

TEXT.English: The Malakim are generous to those who are loyal to them. Do not let this glory we share with you go to waste.
TEXT.French: Les Malakims sont généreux avec ceux qui leur sont loyaux. Ne laissez pas la gloire que nous partageons avec vous se perdre.
TEXT.German: The Malakim are generous to those who are loyal to them. Do not let this glory we share with you go to waste.
TEXT.Italian: The Malakim are generous to those who are loyal to them. Do not let this glory we share with you go to waste.
TEXT.Spanish: The Malakim are generous to those who are loyal to them. Do not let this glory we share with you go to waste.

TEXT.English: The Malakim are experiencing harsh times. This is an opportunity for you to show your loyalty to us.
TEXT.French: Les Malakims connaissent des temps difficiles. C'est une opportunité pour vous de montrer votre loyauté envers nous.
TEXT.German: The Malakim are experiencing harsh times. This is an opportunity for you to show your loyalty to us.
TEXT.Italian: The Malakim are experiencing harsh times. This is an opportunity for you to show your loyalty to us.
TEXT.Spanish: The Malakim are experiencing harsh times. This is an opportunity for you to show your loyalty to us.

TEXT.English: Some may break my trust once, but never twice.
TEXT.French: Il arrive que certains brisent ma confiance une fois, mais jamais deux fois.
TEXT.German: Some may break my trust once, but never twice.
TEXT.Italian: Some may break my trust once, but never twice.
TEXT.Spanish: Some may break my trust once, but never twice.

TEXT.English: These times are only temporary. I can assure you that under my guidance, the Malakim will rise again. I suggest you meditate on it.
TEXT.French: Ces temps ne sont que temporaire. Je peux vous assurer que sous ma direction, les Malakims vont se relever. Je vous suggère de méditer là-dessus.
TEXT.German: These times are only temporary. I can assure you that under my guidance, the Malakim will rise again. I suggest you meditate on it.
TEXT.Italian: These times are only temporary. I can assure you that under my guidance, the Malakim will rise again. I suggest you meditate on it.
TEXT.Spanish: These times are only temporary. I can assure you that under my guidance, the Malakim will rise again. I suggest you meditate on it.

TEXT.English: You will come around if you are reasonnable.
TEXT.French: Vous changerez d'avis si vous êtes raisonnable.
TEXT.German: You will come around if you are reasonnable.
TEXT.Italian: You will come around if you are reasonnable.
TEXT.Spanish: You will come around if you are reasonnable.

TEXT.English: Your continued existence depends purely on my whims. Think about it before giving your answer.
TEXT.French: Votre existence ne dépend que de mes caprices. Réfléchissez-y avant de me donner votre réponse.
TEXT.German: Your continued existence depends purely on my whims. Think about it before giving your answer.
TEXT.Italian: Your continued existence depends purely on my whims. Think about it before giving your answer.
TEXT.Spanish: Your continued existence depends purely on my whims. Think about it before giving your answer.

TEXT.English: My raiders are already past your border. I will have them recalled if you bring me what I want yourself.
TEXT.French: Mes pillards ont déjà franchi votre frontière. Je les rappellerais si vous m'apportez ce que je désire vous-même.
TEXT.German: My raiders are already past your border. I will have them recalled if you bring me what I want yourself.
TEXT.Italian: My raiders are already past your border. I will have them recalled if you bring me what I want yourself.
TEXT.Spanish: My raiders are already past your border. I will have them recalled if you bring me what I want yourself.

TEXT.English: I offer you an opportunity to pay your respects to the glorious Malakim empire. Take it.
TEXT.French: Je vous offre une opportunité de présenter votre respect au glorieux empire Malakim. Saisissez-là.
TEXT.German: I offer you an opportunity to pay your respects to the glorious Malakim empire. Take it.
TEXT.Italian: I offer you an opportunity to pay your respects to the glorious Malakim empire. Take it.
TEXT.Spanish: I offer you an opportunity to pay your respects to the glorious Malakim empire. Take it.

TEXT.English: Then, I'll be remembered for one more conquest.
TEXT.French: Dans ce cas, on se souviendra de moi pour une conquête de plus.
TEXT.German: Then, I'll be remembered for one more conquest.
TEXT.Italian: Then, I'll be remembered for one more conquest.
TEXT.Spanish: Then, I'll be remembered for one more conquest.

TEXT.English: The sands under your feet are stirring.
TEXT.French: Les sables sous vos pieds s'agitent.
TEXT.German: The sands under your feet are stirring.
TEXT.Italian: The sands under your feet are stirring.
TEXT.Spanish: The sands under your feet are stirring.

TEXT.English: I built our empire by seizing the right opportunities when they came. I cannot say the same about you.
TEXT.French: I built our empire by seizing the right opportunities when they came. I cannot say the same about you.
TEXT.German: I built our empire by seizing the right opportunities when they came. I cannot say the same about you.
TEXT.Italian: I built our empire by seizing the right opportunities when they came. I cannot say the same about you.
TEXT.Spanish: I built our empire by seizing the right opportunities when they came. I cannot say the same about you.

TEXT.English: The %s1:2 have wronged the Malakim and shall be crushed like all those who did before them. Lend us a hand, and we will share the spoils of conquest.
TEXT.French: Les %s1:2 ont fait du tort aux Malakims et seront écrasés comme tous ceux qui les ont précédés. Donnez-nous un coup de main, et nous partagerons le butin de leur conquête.
TEXT.German: The %s1:2 have wronged the Malakim and shall be crushed like all those who did before them. Lend us a hand, and we will share the spoils of conquest.
TEXT.Italian: The %s1:2 have wronged the Malakim and shall be crushed like all those who did before them. Lend us a hand, and we will share the spoils of conquest.
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1:2 have wronged the Malakim and shall be crushed like all those who did before them. Lend us a hand, and we will share the spoils of conquest.

TEXT.English: So this is how it ends? With my dying breath I curse you. May the sands swallow you up, may the vultures devour your flesh while you still live, and may your very bones crumble to dust!
TEXT.French: C'est ainsi que cela se finit? De mon dernier souffle je vous maudis. Que les sables vous avalent, que les vautours vous dévorent la chair à vif, et que vos os soient réduits en poussière !
TEXT.German: So this is how it ends? With my dying breath I curse you. May the sands swallow you up, may the vultures devour your flesh while you still live, and may your very bones crumble to dust!
TEXT.Italian: So this is how it ends? With my dying breath I curse you. May the sands swallow you up, may the vultures devour your flesh while you still live, and may your very bones crumble to dust!
TEXT.Spanish: So this is how it ends? With my dying breath I curse you. May the sands swallow you up, may the vultures devour your flesh while you still live, and may your very bones crumble to dust!

TEXT.English: To prevent the destruction of all, you have to destroy some yourself.
TEXT.French: Afin d'éviter la destruction de tous, nous devons vous détruire vous.
TEXT.German: Um die Zerstörung der Welt zu verhindern, müsst Ihr ein wenig Euch selbst zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: To prevent the destruction of all, you have to destroy some yourself.
TEXT.Spanish: To prevent the destruction of all, you have to destroy some yourself.

TEXT.English: In the deep jungle, we thrive. Turn not your eyes toward our lands and we shall live in peace.
TEXT.French: DAns le jungles profondes nous nous épanouissons. Ne cherchez pas à annexer nos terres et nous vivrons en paix.
TEXT.German: Tief im Dschungel gedeihen wir. Wendet Eure gierigen Augen nicht auf unser Land, und wir werden in Frieden leben.
TEXT.Italian: In the deep jungle, we thrive. Turn not your eyes toward our lands and we shall live in peace.
TEXT.Spanish: In the deep jungle, we thrive. Turn not your eyes toward our lands and we shall live in peace.

TEXT.English: Your words are lies and we see through them. Leave whilst you can still speak.
TEXT.French: Vos paroles sont des mensonges et nous voyons ce qui se cache derrière. Partez tant que vous pouvez encore parler.
TEXT.German: Eure Worte sind nichts als Lüge, und wir durchschauen sie. Geht, solange Ihr noch reden könnt.
TEXT.Italian: Your words are lies and we see through them. Leave whilst you can still speak.
TEXT.Spanish: Your words are lies and we see through them. Leave whilst you can still speak.

TEXT.English: The peace is welcome. We hope it will last the Age.
TEXT.French: La paix est la bienvenue. Nous espérons qu'elle survivra à cet Âge.
TEXT.German: Der Friede ist willkommen. Wir hoffen, er überdauert die Zeit.
TEXT.Italian: The peace is welcome. We hope it will last the Age.
TEXT.Spanish: The peace is welcome. We hope it will last the Age.

TEXT.English: Have you truly changed your ways? I cannot take that chance.
TEXT.French: Avez-vous vraiment changé ? Je ne peux pas prendre ce risque.
TEXT.German: Habt Ihr tatsächlich Euren Weg verlassen? Ich werde diese einmalige Chance ungenutzt verstreichen lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Have you truly changed your ways? I cannot take that chance.
TEXT.Spanish: Have you truly changed your ways? I cannot take that chance.

TEXT.English: Fear not, [CT_NAME]. There is still hope for the world so long as you and I remain in it.
TEXT.French: N'ayez crainte, [CT_NAME]. Il reste un espoir pour le monde tant que vous et moi en faisons partie.
TEXT.German: Fürchtet Euch nicht, [CT_NAME]. Es besteht noch Hoffnung für die Welt, solange wir und Ihr uns noch darin befinden.
TEXT.Italian: Fear not, [CT_NAME]. There is still hope for the world so long as you and I remain in it.
TEXT.Spanish: Fear not, [CT_NAME]. There is still hope for the world so long as you and I remain in it.

TEXT.English: Your path could lead to the end of us all. We will not allow you to walk it much longer, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: La voie que vous avez choisie pourrait conduire à notre fin à tous. Nous ne nous permettrons plus longtemps de la suivre, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: Der von Euch eingeschlagene Weg könnte in unserer aller Ende gipfeln. Wir werden es Euch nicht gestatten, ihn noch länger zu beschreiten, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: Your path could lead to the end of us all. We will not allow you to walk it much longer, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: Your path could lead to the end of us all. We will not allow you to walk it much longer, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: The deal is both prudent and wise. We accept.
TEXT.French: Cet accord est à la fois prudent et sage. Nous acceptons.
TEXT.German: Der Handel ist sowohl umsichtig als auch weise. Wir nehmen an.
TEXT.Italian: The deal is both prudent and wise. We accept.
TEXT.Spanish: The deal is both prudent and wise. We accept.

TEXT.English: Your words lack wisdom, [CT_NAME]
TEXT.French: Vos paroles manquent de sagesse, [CT_NAME]
TEXT.German: Eure Worte entbehren jedweder Weisheit, [CT_NAME]
TEXT.Italian: Your words lack wisdom, [CT_NAME]
TEXT.Spanish: Your words lack wisdom, [CT_NAME]

TEXT.English: There is too much conflict in the world - more than it can bear. Is there a way for us to find peace in the maelstrom?
TEXT.French: Il y a trop de conflits dans ce monde, plus que je n'en peux supporter. Il y a-t-il moyen de trouver la paix dans ce maëlstrom ?
TEXT.German: Die Welt wird beherrscht von zu vielen Konflikten - von mehr, als sie ertragen kann. Existiert da ein Weg für uns, der uns Frieden finden lässt in diesem Mahlstrom?
TEXT.Italian: There is too much conflict in the world - more than it can bear. Is there a way for us to find peace in the maelstrom?
TEXT.Spanish: There is too much conflict in the world - more than it can bear. Is there a way for us to find peace in the maelstrom?

TEXT.English: We thank you for this.
TEXT.French: Nous vous en remercions.
TEXT.German: Wir danken Euch dafür.
TEXT.Italian: We thank you for this.
TEXT.Spanish: We thank you for this.

TEXT.English: I wish you would reconsider. You do not understand what is to come.
TEXT.French: Je vous demande d'y réfléchir à nouveau. Vous ne comprenez pas ce qui se prépare.
TEXT.German: Ich wünschte, Ihr würdet das noch einmal überdenken. Ihr versteht nicht, was zu Kommen im Begriff ist.
TEXT.Italian: I wish you would reconsider. You do not understand what is to come.
TEXT.Spanish: I wish you would reconsider. You do not understand what is to come.

TEXT.English: We wished to save Erebus, but why save the world for such as you? It is better off ended.
TEXT.French: Nous voulions sauver Érebus, mais pourquoi sauver le monde pour des êtres tels que vous ? Il est préférable qu'il disparaisse.
TEXT.German: Unser Wunsch war es, Erebus zu bewahren, aber weshalb sollten wir die Welt für jemanden wie Euch erhalten? Es ist besser, wenn es nun endet.
TEXT.Italian: We wished to save Erebus, but why save the world for such as you? It is better off ended.
TEXT.Spanish: We wished to save Erebus, but why save the world for such as you? It is better off ended.

TEXT.English: Your walls will not save you this time. Soon you will see them explode.
TEXT.French: Vos murs ne vous sauveront aps cette fois. Vous les verrez bientôt exploser.
TEXT.German: Diesmal werden dich deine Mauern nicht retten. Sie werden dir bald um die Ohren fliegen.
TEXT.Italian: Your walls will not save you this time. Soon you will see them explode.
TEXT.Spanish: Your walls will not save you this time. Soon you will see them explode.

TEXT.English: We are slaves of the childish gods no more. Respect it, and the peace will last.
TEXT.French: Nous ne sommes plus les esclaves des dieux infantiles. Respectez-le, et la paix durera.
TEXT.German: Wir sind keine Sklaven irgendwelcher kindischen Götter mehr. Respektiere dies und der Frieden wird andauern können.
TEXT.Italian: We are slaves of the childish gods no more. Respect it, and the peace will last.
TEXT.Spanish: We are slaves of the childish gods no more. Respect it, and the peace will last.

TEXT.English: Coward. Get him from my sight.
TEXT.French: Lâche. Sortez-le de ma vue.
TEXT.German: Feigling. Aus meinen Augen!
TEXT.Italian: Coward. Get him from my sight.
TEXT.Spanish: Coward. Get him from my sight.

TEXT.English: Finally. I really miss my laboratory.
TEXT.French: Enfin. Mon laboratoire me manqauit vraiment.
TEXT.German: Na endlich. I vermisse mein Laboratorium.
TEXT.Italian: Finally. I really miss my laboratory.
TEXT.Spanish: Finally. I really miss my laboratory.

TEXT.English: No way. I have some siege prototypes yet to test.
TEXT.French: Impossible. Nous avons encore des prototypes de machines de sièges à tester.
TEXT.German: Keine Chance. Ich muss noch ein paar neue Belagerungswaffen ausprobieren.
TEXT.Italian: No way. I have some siege prototypes yet to test.
TEXT.Spanish: No way. I have some siege prototypes yet to test.

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. There are so many things I want to tell you.
TEXT.French: Bienvenue, [CT_NAME]. J'ai tant de choses à vous dire.
TEXT.German: Willkommen, [CT_NAME]. Es gibt soviel, was ich Euch sagen möchte.
TEXT.Italian: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. There are so many things I want to tell you.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. There are so many things I want to tell you.

TEXT.English: You actions are an offense to all intelligent beings, [CT_NAME]. But you will be corrected soon.
TEXT.French: Vos actes sont une offense envers tous les êtres intelligents, [CT_NAME]. Mais vous serez corrigé prochainement.
TEXT.German: Eure Handlungen sind eine Beleidigung für jedes intelligente Wesen, [CT_NAME]. Aber das kann man ja richtig stellen.
TEXT.Italian: You actions are an offense to all intelligent beings, [CT_NAME]. But you will be corrected soon.
TEXT.Spanish: You actions are an offense to all intelligent beings, [CT_NAME]. But you will be corrected soon.

TEXT.English: Great! Where do I sign?
TEXT.French: Super ! Je signe où ?
TEXT.German: Na klar! Wo muss ich unterschreiben?
TEXT.Italian: Great! Where do I sign?
TEXT.Spanish: Great! Where do I sign?

TEXT.English: No, [CT_NAME], that is not good enough.
TEXT.French: Non, [CT_NAME], ce n'est pas suffisant.
TEXT.German: Nein nein, [CT_NAME], das ist nicht gut genug.
TEXT.Italian: No, [CT_NAME], that is not good enough.
TEXT.Spanish: No, [CT_NAME], that is not good enough.

TEXT.English: You surely know that I can count. Try better.
TEXT.French: Vous savez sûrement que je sais compter. Faites mieux que ça.
TEXT.German: Ich denke doch, Ihr wisst, dass ich zählen kann, oder? Versucht es anders und vor allem, besser!
TEXT.Italian: You surely know that I can count. Try better.
TEXT.Spanish: You surely know that I can count. Try better.

TEXT.English: Are you trying to buy us for some junk? Your offer is ridiculous.
TEXT.French: Êtes-vous en train de d'essayer de nous refiler vos déchêts ? Votre offre est minable.
TEXT.German: Wollt ihr mich mit diesem Schrott überreden? Das Angebot ist doch lachhaft.
TEXT.Italian: Are you trying to buy us for some junk? Your offer is ridiculous.
TEXT.Spanish: Are you trying to buy us for some junk? Your offer is ridiculous.

TEXT.English: This war costs us both too many resources. It is time to end it, don't you think?
TEXT.French: Cette guerre nous coûte à tous deux bien trop de ressources. Il est temps d'y mettre fin, non ?
TEXT.German: Dieser Krieg kostet uns beide jede Menge Kraft. Denkt ihr nicht auch, dass es Zeit wird, ihn zu beenden?
TEXT.Italian: This war costs us both too many resources. It is time to end it, don't you think?
TEXT.Spanish: This war costs us both too many resources. It is time to end it, don't you think?

TEXT.English: Thank you.
TEXT.French: Merci.
TEXT.German: Vielen herzlichen Dank.
TEXT.Italian: Thank you.
TEXT.Spanish: Thank you.

TEXT.English: Do you like the look of our army? Now give me what I want or you will see it more often.
TEXT.French: Aimez-vous la vision de mon armée ? Donnez-moi donc ce que je veux, ou vous la verrez régulièrement.
TEXT.German: Mögt ihr den Anblick meiner Armeen? Gebt mir was ich will, oder ihr werdet sie Euch aus nächster Nähe ansehen können.
TEXT.Italian: Do you like the look of our army? Now give me what I want or you will see it more often.
TEXT.Spanish: Do you like the look of our army? Now give me what I want or you will see it more often.

TEXT.English: You are cheating at deals. Time to make it even.
TEXT.French: Vous trichez sur les accords. Il est temps d'égaliser les choses.
TEXT.German: Ihr betrügt doch bei unseren Abmachungen. Es ist Zeit, das nun auszugleichen.
TEXT.Italian: You are cheating at deals. Time to make it even.
TEXT.Spanish: You are cheating at deals. Time to make it even.

TEXT.English: Could you possibly spare this? It will be a great step forward for our people.
TEXT.French: Pourriez-vous nous faire don de ceci ? Ce serait un grand pas pour notre peuple.
TEXT.German: Könntet ihr das vielleicht entbehren? Es wird unser Volk einen großen Schritt weiterbringen.
TEXT.Italian: Could you possibly spare this? It will be a great step forward for our people.
TEXT.Spanish: Could you possibly spare this? It will be a great step forward for our people.

TEXT.English: We really need it. Too bad you do not see the reason.
TEXT.French: Nous en avons vraiment besoin. Dommage que vous ne voyiez pas pourquoi.
TEXT.German: Wir brauchen es wirklich. Schade, dass du kein Einsehen hast.
TEXT.Italian: We really need it. Too bad you do not see the reason.
TEXT.Spanish: We really need it. Too bad you do not see the reason.

TEXT.English: The world was not ready for our ideas. But we will return.
TEXT.French: Le monde n'était pas prêt à entendre nos idées. Mais nous reviendrons.
TEXT.German: Die Welt war nicht bereit für unsere Ideen. Aber wir werden wiederkommen.
TEXT.Italian: The world was not ready for our ideas. But we will return.
TEXT.Spanish: The world was not ready for our ideas. But we will return.

TEXT.English: "I may have failed, but my dream will live on. Humanity will Ascend, and no matter how hard you try, you will never stop it; it is inevitable."
TEXT.French: "I may have failed, but my dream will live on. Humanity will Ascend, and no matter how hard you try, you will never stop it; it is inevitable."
TEXT.German: "Ich mag versagt haben, aber mein Traum wird weiterleben. Die Menschheit wird sich erheben, es spielt keine Rolle, wie sehr du versuchst, es aufzuhalten. Es ist unausweichlich."
TEXT.Italian: "I may have failed, but my dream will live on. Humanity will Ascend, and no matter how hard you try, you will never stop it; it is inevitable."
TEXT.Spanish: "I may have failed, but my dream will live on. Humanity will Ascend, and no matter how hard you try, you will never stop it; it is inevitable."

TEXT.English: "My beautiful kingdom, NO! I will make you pay for this, even if it takes me a thousand years!"
TEXT.French: "My beautiful kingdom, NO! I will make you pay for this, even if it takes me a thousand years!"
TEXT.German: "Mein schönes Königreich, NEIN! Ich werde dich bezahlen lassen, auch wenn ich dafür tausend Jahre brauchen sollte!"
TEXT.Italian: "My beautiful kingdom, NO! I will make you pay for this, even if it takes me a thousand years!"
TEXT.Spanish: "My beautiful kingdom, NO! I will make you pay for this, even if it takes me a thousand years!"

TEXT.English: "I am without regret. I sought to serve the people, and I have failed, but even so I did my best."
TEXT.French: "I am without regret. I sought to serve the people, and I have failed, but even so I did my best."
TEXT.German: "Ich bereue nichts. I strebte danach, dem Volk zu dienen, und ich habe versagt. Aber dennoch, ich habe mein bestes gegeben."
TEXT.Italian: "I am without regret. I sought to serve the people, and I have failed, but even so I did my best."
TEXT.Spanish: "I am without regret. I sought to serve the people, and I have failed, but even so I did my best."

TEXT.English: You have never lived until you have almost died; for those who fought for it, life has a flavor the protected will never know.
TEXT.French: Vous n'aurez jamais vécu jusqu'à votre mort prochaine; car pour ceux qui se sont battus pour elle, la vie a un arôme que les protégés ne connaîtront jamais.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt nie gelebt, eh Ihr nicht dem Tode ins Auge geblickt habt. Für jene, die dafür kämpften, hat das Leben einen Geschmack, den die Behüteten nie kennenlernen werden.
TEXT.Italian: You have never lived until you have almost died; for those who fought for it, life has a flavor the protected will never know.
TEXT.Spanish: Nunca habéis vivido hasta que casi habéis muerto; para aquellos que lucharon por ella, la vida tiene un gusto que los protegidos nunca conocerán.

TEXT.English: We come to wage war with the Infernal, your fate is inconsequential.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en guerre contre l'Enfer, votre destin est sans importance.
TEXT.German: Wir wagen den Kampf gegen die Hölle. Euer Schicksal ist belanglos.
TEXT.Italian: We come to wage war with the Infernal, your fate is inconsequential.
TEXT.Spanish: Venimos para entablar batalla con los Infernales, vuestro destino es irrelevante.

TEXT.English: Do I look eager to see you, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: Ai-je l'air désireux de vous voir, [CT_NAME] ?
TEXT.German: Sehe ich aus, als ob ich erpicht darauf wäre, Euch zu sehen, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Do I look eager to see you, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Acaso parezco entusiasmado de veros, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Your life has been spared. Use it wisely.
TEXT.French: Votre vie a été épargnée. Utilisez-la judicieusement.
TEXT.German: Euer Leben wurde verschont. Nutzt es weise.
TEXT.Italian: Your life has been spared. Use it wisely.
TEXT.Spanish: Vuestra vida ha sido perdonada. Usadla sabiamente.

TEXT.English: Mercy is for the innocent. Join your friends in Hell.
TEXT.French: La pitié est pour les innocents. Rejoignez vos amis en Enfer.
TEXT.German: Gnade ist für die Unschuldigen. Fahrt hinab zu Euren Freunden in der Hölle.
TEXT.Italian: Mercy is for the innocent. Join your friends in Hell.
TEXT.Spanish: La piedad es para los inocentes. Uníos a vuestros amigos en el Infierno.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME]. Well, speak already.
TEXT.French: [CT_NAME]. Bien, parlez dès à présent.
TEXT.German: [CT_NAME]. Gut, sprecht, rasch.
TEXT.Italian: [CT_NAME]. Well, speak already.
TEXT.Spanish: [CT_NAME]. Bien, hablad, ya.

TEXT.English: My patience is razor thin with you, [CT_NAME]. Let's hope I like what you have to say.
TEXT.French: Ma patience envers vous est sur le fil du rasoir, [CT_NAME]. Espérons que j'apprécierai ce que vous avez à dire.
TEXT.German: Ihr tanzt auf Messers Schneide, [CT_NAME]. Hoffentlich habt Ihr etwas Angenehmes mitzuteilen.
TEXT.Italian: My patience is razor thin with you, [CT_NAME]. Let's hope I like what you have to say.
TEXT.Spanish: Mi paciencia es una hoja afilada para vos, [CT_NAME]. Esperemos que me guste lo que tengáis que decir.

TEXT.English: Done. Now be gone. The bargaining table is a waste of time, as Hell's power grows by the hour.
TEXT.French: C'est fait. Maintenant partez. Négocier est une perte de temps, tandis que la puissance de l'Enfer grandit à chaque heure.
TEXT.German: Wir sind fertig. Nun hinfort mit Euch. Verhandlungen sind Zeitverschwendung, denn die Kraft der Hölle wächst stündlich.
TEXT.Italian: Done. Now be gone. The bargaining table is a waste of time, as Hell's power grows by the hour.
TEXT.Spanish: Hecho. Ahora ve. La mesa de negociaciones es una pérdida de tiempo mientras el poder del Infierno crece por momentos.

TEXT.English: I will not waste my breath responding to this nonsense.
TEXT.French: Je ne gaspillerai pas mon souffle en répondant à ces balivernes.
TEXT.German: Ich werde keinen Atem für eine Antwort auf diesen Unsinn verschwenden.
TEXT.Italian: I will not waste my breath responding to this nonsense.
TEXT.Spanish: No gastaré mi aliento respondiendo a esta tonteria.

TEXT.English: You have not proven your devotion to our cause.
TEXT.French: Vous ne nous avez pas prouvé votre dévotion à notre cause.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt Eure Hingabe zu unserer Sache noch nicht bewiesen.
TEXT.Italian: You have not proven your devotion to our cause.
TEXT.Spanish: No habéis probado vuestra devoción hacia nuestra causa.

TEXT.English: You seek to buy me off? After your transgressions?
TEXT.French: Vous cherchez à m'acheter ? Après vos transgressions ?
TEXT.German: Ihr wollt mich wohl zum Besten halten? Und dies nach all Euren Verfehlungen?
TEXT.Italian: You seek to buy me off? After your transgressions?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Intentáis sobornarme? ¿Después de vuestras transgresiones?

TEXT.English: The blood drenching the field of battle is recompense for your misjudgments. We need not meet again, if you turn your back on your former evil.
TEXT.French: Le sang détrempant le champ de bataille est la récompense pour votre erreur de jugement. Nous n'aurons pas besoin de nous rencontrer de nouveau si vous renoncez à votre ancien mal.
TEXT.German: Das Blut, welches die Schlachtfelder tränkt, ist ein Zeugnis Eurer Fehlentscheidungen. Wir müssen uns dort nicht wiedersehen, falls Ihr Eurer früheren Boshaftigkeit abschwört!
TEXT.Italian: The blood drenching the field of battle is recompense for your misjudgments. We need not meet again, if you turn your back on your former evil.
TEXT.Spanish: La sangre que empapa el campo de batalla es la recompensa por vuestras injusticias. No necesitamos volver a encontrarnos, si le dáis la espalda a vuestra previa maldad.

TEXT.English: It seems some mortals have wisdom after all.
TEXT.French: Il semble que certains mortels font pourfois preuve de sagesse après tout.
TEXT.German: Es scheint, als wohnte manchen Sterblichen letzten Endes doch noch etwas Weisheit inne.
TEXT.Italian: It seems some mortals have wisdom after all.
TEXT.Spanish: Parece que después de todo algunos mortales son sabios.

TEXT.English: We protect you from the Infernal menace, but we cannot do it for free.
TEXT.French: Nous vous protégeons de la menace des Infernaux, mais nous ne pouvons le faire gratuitement.
TEXT.German: Wir schützen Euch vor der Bedrohung durch die Infernalen, aber sicher nicht für nichts.
TEXT.Italian: We protect you from the Infernal menace, but we cannot do it for free.
TEXT.Spanish: Os protegemos de la amenaza Infernal, pero no podemos hacerlo por nada a cambio.

TEXT.English: You are not using this to its full effect. Let me show you how.
TEXT.French: Vous n'utilisez pas ceci à son plein potentiel. Laissez-moi vous montrer comment faire.
TEXT.German: Ihr nutzt das nicht in vollem Maße. Lasst Euch zeigen, wie das geht.
TEXT.Italian: You are not using this to its full effect. Let me show you how.
TEXT.Spanish: No estáis utilizando esto con la máxima efectividad. Dejadme enseñaros cómo.

TEXT.English: Our mission has taken a setback. Please, you must aid us.
TEXT.French: Notre mission a subi un revers. S'il vous plaît, vous devez nous aider.
TEXT.German: Wir haben einen Rückschlag erleiden müssen. Bitte, Ihr müsst uns helfen.
TEXT.Italian: Our mission has taken a setback. Please, you must aid us.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra misión ha sufrido un revés. Por favor, debes ayudarnos.

TEXT.English: You must not understand the severity of the times. This land has become a battleground and if you do not aid us, you side with the enemy. So be it.
TEXT.French: Vous ne semblez pas comprendre la rudesse de ces temps. Cette terre est devenu un champ de bataille et si vous n'êtes pas avec nous, vous êtes contre nous. Ainsi soit-il.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt anscheinend den Ernst der Lage in diesen Zeiten nicht begriffen. Dieses Land ist zu einem Schlachtfeld geworden, helft Ihr nicht uns, so doch dem Feinde. Dann sei es so.
TEXT.Italian: You must not understand the severity of the times. This land has become a battleground and if you do not aid us, you side with the enemy. So be it.
TEXT.Spanish: No debéis enterder la austeridad de estos tiempos. Esta tierra se ha tornado en un campo de batalla y si no nos ayudáis, es que estáis del lado del enemigo. Así sea.

TEXT.English: "You finish me, before my mission is complete? Fool, the Infernal shall make your empire a living hell."
TEXT.French: "Vous m'achevez avant que ma mission soit accomplie ? Pauvre fou, les Infernaux feront de votre empire un enfer vivant."
TEXT.German: "Ihr tötet mich, bevor meine Mission erfüllt wurde? Narr, die Infernalen mögen dein Reich zu einer wahrhaftigen Hölle machen."
TEXT.Italian: "You finish me, before my mission is complete? Fool, the Infernal shall make your empire a living hell."
TEXT.Spanish: "You finish me, before my mission is complete? Fool, the Infernal shall make your empire a living hell."
