TEXT.Spanish: I am altering the deal. Pray I don't alter it further.

TEXT.English: The Scions of Patria praise your virtue [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: The Scions of Patria praise your virtue [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: The Scions of Patria praise your virtue [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: The Scions of Patria praise your virtue [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: The Scions of Patria praise your virtue [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Very well.
TEXT.French: Very well.
TEXT.German: Very well.
TEXT.Italian: Very well.
TEXT.Spanish: Very well.

TEXT.English: That will not be ratified.
TEXT.French: That will not be ratified.
TEXT.German: That will not be ratified.
TEXT.Italian: That will not be ratified.
TEXT.Spanish: That will not be ratified.

TEXT.English: Very well. Patria accedes, but Patria remembers.
TEXT.French: Very well. Patria accedes, but Patria remembers.
TEXT.German: Very well. Patria accedes, but Patria remembers.
TEXT.Italian: Very well. Patria accedes, but Patria remembers.
TEXT.Spanish: Very well. Patria accedes, but Patria remembers.

TEXT.English: I hold the right to command, not you.
TEXT.French: I hold the right to command, not you.
TEXT.German: I hold the right to command, not you.
TEXT.Italian: I hold the right to command, not you.
TEXT.Spanish: I hold the right to command, not you.

TEXT.English: Patria Reborn requires assistance from its ally [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.French: Patria Ressuscitée demande l'aide de ses alliés, les [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.German: Patria Reborn requires assistance from its ally [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Italian: Patria Reborn requires assistance from its ally [CT_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Spanish: Patria Reborn requires assistance from its ally [CT_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: Disappointing.
TEXT.French: Disappointing.
TEXT.German: Disappointing.
TEXT.Italian: Disappointing.
TEXT.Spanish: Disappointing.

TEXT.English: Remember that all relationships are reciprocal, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Remember that all relationships are reciprocal, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: Remember that all relationships are reciprocal, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: Remember that all relationships are reciprocal, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: Remember that all relationships are reciprocal, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Kylorin would be saddened to hear that.
TEXT.French: Kylorin would be saddened to hear that.
TEXT.German: Kylorin would be saddened to hear that.
TEXT.Italian: Kylorin would be saddened to hear that.
TEXT.Spanish: Kylorin would be saddened to hear that.

TEXT.English: I request homage from you [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: I request homage from you [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: I request homage from you [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: I request homage from you [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: I request homage from you [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: I ask for this for the sake of the Pax Patria.
TEXT.French: I ask for this for the sake of the Pax Patria.
TEXT.German: I ask for this for the sake of the Pax Patria.
TEXT.Italian: I ask for this for the sake of the Pax Patria.
TEXT.Spanish: I ask for this for the sake of the Pax Patria.

TEXT.English: In the name of our mutual savior Kylorin, would [CT_CIV_SHORT] help us?
TEXT.French: In the name of our mutual savior Kylorin, would [CT_CIV_SHORT] help us?
TEXT.German: In the name of our mutual savior Kylorin, would [CT_CIV_SHORT] help us?
TEXT.Italian: In the name of our mutual savior Kylorin, would [CT_CIV_SHORT] help us?
TEXT.Spanish: In the name of our mutual savior Kylorin, would [CT_CIV_SHORT] help us?

TEXT.English: The Reborn Patria does not appreciate your behavior [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: The Reborn Patria does not appreciate your behavior [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: The Reborn Patria does not appreciate your behavior [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: The Reborn Patria does not appreciate your behavior [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: The Reborn Patria does not appreciate your behavior [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: The enlightened citizens of Patria Reborn had their eyes on you. You diminish yourself.
TEXT.French: The enlightened citizens of Patria Reborn had their eyes on you. You diminish yourself.
TEXT.German: The enlightened citizens of Patria Reborn had their eyes on you. You diminish yourself.
TEXT.Italian: The enlightened citizens of Patria Reborn had their eyes on you. You diminish yourself.
TEXT.Spanish: The enlightened citizens of Patria Reborn had their eyes on you. You diminish yourself.

TEXT.English: I had hoped for a more genuine alliance.
TEXT.French: I had hoped for a more genuine alliance.
TEXT.German: I had hoped for a more genuine alliance.
TEXT.Italian: I had hoped for a more genuine alliance.
TEXT.Spanish: I had hoped for a more genuine alliance.

TEXT.English: Patria Reborn has chosen to follow %s1. You would be wise to follow our example.
TEXT.French: Patria Reborn has chosen to follow %s1. You would be wise to follow our example.
TEXT.German: Patria Reborn has chosen to follow %s1. You would be wise to follow our example.
TEXT.Italian: Patria Reborn has chosen to follow %s1. You would be wise to follow our example.
TEXT.Spanish: Patria Reborn has chosen to follow %s1. You would be wise to follow our example.

TEXT.English: You reject the Gift, and now you reject our wisdom?
TEXT.French: You reject the Gift, and now you reject our wisdom?
TEXT.German: You reject the Gift, and now you reject our wisdom?
TEXT.Italian: You reject the Gift, and now you reject our wisdom?
TEXT.Spanish: You reject the Gift, and now you reject our wisdom?

TEXT.English: I, the Emperor of Patria Reborn, call upon the ally of [CT_CIV_SHORT] in our struggle against %s1.
TEXT.French: I, the Emperor of Patria Reborn, call upon the ally of [CT_CIV_SHORT] in our struggle against %s1.
TEXT.German: I, the Emperor of Patria Reborn, call upon the ally of [CT_CIV_SHORT] in our struggle against %s1.
TEXT.Italian: I, the Emperor of Patria Reborn, call upon the ally of [CT_CIV_SHORT] in our struggle against %s1.
TEXT.Spanish: I, the Emperor of Patria Reborn, call upon the ally of [CT_CIV_SHORT] in our struggle against %s1.

TEXT.English: Patria Reborn expects better.
TEXT.French: Patria Reborn expects better.
TEXT.German: Patria Reborn expects better.
TEXT.Italian: Patria Reborn expects better.
TEXT.Spanish: Patria Reborn expects better.

TEXT.English: We demand you cease your affairs with %s1!
TEXT.French: We demand you cease your affairs with %s1!
TEXT.German: We demand you cease your affairs with %s1!
TEXT.Italian: We demand you cease your affairs with %s1!
TEXT.Spanish: We demand you cease your affairs with %s1!

TEXT.English: You insult your betters by this, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: You insult your betters by this, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: You insult your betters by this, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: You insult your betters by this, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: You insult your betters by this, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: You have my attention.
TEXT.French: You have my attention.
TEXT.German: You have my attention.
TEXT.Italian: You have my attention.
TEXT.Spanish: You have my attention.

TEXT.English: I wanted to bring the Gift, and with it, a new golden age, to Erebus. Now, I have nothing... but Regret.
TEXT.French: I wanted to bring the Gift, and with it, a new golden age, to Erebus. Now, I have nothing... but Regret.
TEXT.German: I wanted to bring the Gift, and with it, a new golden age, to Erebus. Now, I have nothing... but Regret.
TEXT.Italian: I wanted to bring the Gift, and with it, a new golden age, to Erebus. Now, I have nothing... but Regret.
TEXT.Spanish: I wanted to bring the Gift, and with it, a new golden age, to Erebus. Now, I have nothing... but Regret.

TEXT.English: I am afraid our patience with you has ended. Of course, your empire has always been scheduled for annihilation, as we all are, but your words and actions have demanded that your destruction shall come much earlier than planned.
TEXT.French: Je crains que notre patience envers vous ne soit épuisée. Bien sûr il a toujours été prévu que votre empire soit annihilé, comme tous les autres, mais vos paroles et vos actes font que votre destruction doit arriver bien plus tôt que prévu.
TEXT.German: Ich fürchte unsere Geduld mit Euch ist zu Ende. Selbstverständlich war Euer Reich schon immer für den Untergang vorgesehen, so wie wir es alle sind. Aber Eure Worte und Taten verlangen nach Eurer sofortigen Vernichtung.
TEXT.Italian: I am afraid our patience with you has ended. Of course, your empire has always been scheduled for annihilation, as we all are, but your words and actions have demanded that your destruction shall come much earlier than planned.
TEXT.Spanish: Me temo que nuestra paciencia con vos ha terminado. Por supuesto, siempre ha estado prevista la aniquilación de vuestro imperio, como lo está el mío y el de todos, pero vuestras palabras y vuestras acciones han provocado que vuestra destrucción llegue mucho antes de lo previsto.

TEXT.English: Ah, what have we here, another feeble civilization awaiting the apocalypse?
TEXT.French: Ah, qu'avons-nous là, une autre civilisation fragile attendant l'apocalypse ?
TEXT.German: Ah, wen haben wir denn da, eine weitere erbärmliche Zivilisation in Erwartung der Apokalypse?
TEXT.Italian: Ah, what have we here, another feeble civilization awaiting the apocalypse?
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, qué tenemos aquí, ¿otra febril civilización esperando al apocalipsis?

TEXT.English: You are naught but a puny weakling, [CT_NAME], be gone from my sight.
TEXT.French: Vous n'êtes rien d'autre qu'une pauvre mauviette, [CT_NAME]. Hors de ma vue.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid ein Nichts und ein kümmerlicher Schwächling, [CT_NAME], verschwindet aus meinem Blickfeld.
TEXT.Italian: You are naught but a puny weakling, [CT_NAME], be gone from my sight.
TEXT.Spanish: No sois nada más que un cobarde insignificante, [CT_NAME], fuera de mi vista.

TEXT.English: It seems there will be no exchange of fiery death between us in the immediate future. A pity...
TEXT.French: Il semble qu'il n'y aura plus d'échange de morts passionnées entre nous dans un avenir proche. Quel dommage...
TEXT.German: Also vorerst kein feuriger Austausch von Mord und Totschlag in naher Zukunft. Eine Schande...
TEXT.Italian: It seems there will be no exchange of fiery death between us in the immediate future. A pity...
TEXT.Spanish: Parece que no habrá un intercambio fiero de muerte entre nosotros en el futuro inmediato. Una pena...

TEXT.English: I think not. You have chosen the path of fire yourself, now walk it all the way to the end.
TEXT.French: Je ne pense pas. Vous avez choisi vous-même la voie du feu, maintenant suivez-là jusqu'au bout.
TEXT.German: Das wird nichts. Wer mit dem Feuer spielt, wird sich verbrennen, nicht wahr?
TEXT.Italian: I think not. You have chosen the path of fire yourself, now walk it all the way to the end.
TEXT.Spanish: Creo que no. Vos mismo habéis elegido el camino del fuego, ahora caminad sobre él hasta el final.

TEXT.English: Welcome once again, fellow horseman of the apocalypse. What do you need from the Sheaim?
TEXT.French: Soyez à nouveau le bienvenu, cher Cavalier de l'Apocalypse. Qu'attendez-vous des Sheaïms.
TEXT.German: Ein erneutes Willkommen, Gefährte auf dem Ritt zur Apokalypse. Was führt Euch zu den Sheaïm?
TEXT.Italian: Welcome once again, fellow horseman of the apocalypse. What do you need from the Sheaim?
TEXT.Spanish: Bienvenido una vez más, compañero jinete del apocalipsis. ¿Qué necesitáis de los Sheaim?

TEXT.English: Oh, it's you again. Don't mind the screams, it's just our newest recruits being conditioned. Apparently the process takes some getting used to. State your business quickly, or you might just find yourself joining them.
TEXT.French: Oh, encore vous. Ne vous préoccupez pas des cris, ce sont juste nos nouvelles recrues en train d'être conditionnées. Apparemment on met du temps à s'habituer au procédé. Faites vite ce que vous avez à faire, ou vous les rejoindrez.
TEXT.German: Oh, Ihr seid es wieder. Stört Euch nicht an den Schreien unserer neuen Rekruten, sie werden gerade gefügig gemacht. Anscheinend müssen sich manche erst noch daran gewöhnen. Macht Eure Vorschläge schnell, sonst könntet Ihr Euch bei ihnen wiederfinden.
TEXT.Italian: Oh, it's you again. Don't mind the screams, it's just our newest recruits being conditioned. Apparently the process takes some getting used to. State your business quickly, or you might just find yourself joining them.
TEXT.Spanish: Oh, sóis vos otra vez. No os preocupéis de los gemidos, sólo son nuestros nuevos reclutas siendo acondicionados. Aparentemente requiere cierto tiempo habituarse al proceso. Decidme qué negocios os traen aquí rápido, u os encontraréis uniéndoos a ellos.

TEXT.English: 'Til the end of time...
TEXT.French: Jusqu'à la fin des temps...
TEXT.German: Bis in alle Ewigkeit...
TEXT.Italian: 'Til the end of time...
TEXT.Spanish: Hasta el fin de los tiempos...

TEXT.English: What a petty threat. And so very idle.
TEXT.French: Quelle menace ridicule. Et si futile.
TEXT.German: Was für eine hübsche Drohung. Und so vollkommen nutzlos.
TEXT.Italian: What a petty threat. And so very idle.
TEXT.Spanish: Que amenaza tan insignificante. Y tan futil.

TEXT.English: I am afraid your proposal is unacceptable at this time.
TEXT.French: J'ai peur que votre proposition ne soit pas acceptable actuellement.
TEXT.German: Es steht zu befürchten, dass Euer Angebot inakzeptabel ist.
TEXT.Italian: I am afraid your proposal is unacceptable at this time.
TEXT.Spanish: Me temo que vuestra propuesta es inaceptable ahora mismo.

TEXT.English: Your insolence knows no bounds, it seems. I would be mad to accept such an offer.
TEXT.French: Votre insolence semble ne pas connaître de limites. Je serais fou d'accepter une telle offre.
TEXT.German: Eure Unverschämtheit kennt scheinbar keine Grenzen. Ein solches Geschäft wäre Wahnsinn.
TEXT.Italian: Your insolence knows no bounds, it seems. I would be mad to accept such an offer.
TEXT.Spanish: Parece que vuestra insolencia no conoce limites. Estaría loco si aceptara una oferta como esa.

TEXT.English: You have shown great prowess in the arts of destruction, [CT_NAME], and I am much impressed. But I trust you are wise enough to know when you've gone too far, and that this time is now. I hope we can come to an agreement on ending this war, lest it destroys us both prematurely.
TEXT.French: Vous avez réalisé de grandes prouesses dans l'art de la destruction [CT_NAME], et j'en suis impressionné. Mais je vous crois assez sage pour savoir à quel moment s'arrêter, et ce moment est venu. J'espère que nous pourrons trouver un arrangement pour mettre fin à cette guerre, et éviter de nous entre-détruire prématurément.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt großes Können in der Kunst der Zerstörung gezeigt, [CT_NAME], und ich bin äußerst beeindruckt. Aber ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr weise genug seid, um zu erkennnen, wann Ihr zu weit gegangen seid, und dass diese Zeit jetzt gekommen ist. Ich hoffe, dass wir eine Vereinbarung über die Beendigung dieses Krieges erzielen können, damit er uns beide nicht frühzeitig vernichtet.
TEXT.Italian: You have shown great prowess in the arts of destruction, [CT_NAME], and I am much impressed. But I trust you are wise enough to know when you've gone too far, and that this time is now. I hope we can come to an agreement on ending this war, lest it destroys us both prematurely.
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis demostrado vuestra gran habilidad en las artes de la destrucción, [CT_NAME], y estoy realmente impresionado. Pero confío en que sóis lo bastante sabio para saber cuándo habéis ido demasiado lejos, y ese momento es ahora. Espero que lleguemos a un acuerdo para poner fin a esta guerra, antes de que nos destruya a ambos prematuramente.

TEXT.English: You have our gratitude, known widely to be a temporary safeguard against sudden showers of meteors. Temporary.
TEXT.French: Vous avez notre gratitude, connue largement pour être temporairement une protection contre de subites pluies de météores. Temporairement.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt unseren Dank, allseits bekannt als temporärer Schutz gegen plötzliche Meteorschauer. Temporär.
TEXT.Italian: You have our gratitude, known widely to be a temporary safeguard against sudden showers of meteors. Temporary.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenéis nuestra gratitud, más conocida por ser una protección temporal contra lluvias repentinas de meteoros. Temporal.

TEXT.English: Once again, it is time that you acknowledge our superiority. It is the only way to ensure the continued survival of your pitiful civilization.
TEXT.French: Une fois de plus, il est temps que vous reconnaissiez notre supériorité. C'est la seule manière pour s'assurer de la pérennité de votre pitoyable civilisation.
TEXT.German: Einmal mehr ist die Zeit gekommen, dass Ihre unsere Überlegenheit anerkennt. Nur so könnt Ihr Euch und Eure erbärmliche Zivilisation vor dem sicheren Untergang bewahren.
TEXT.Italian: Once again, it is time that you acknowledge our superiority. It is the only way to ensure the continued survival of your pitiful civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: Una vez más, es hora de que entendáis nuestra superioridad. Es la única manera para asegurar la supervivencia contínua de vuestra insignificante civilización.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], we have dire need of this. I trust you are wise enough to give us what we want.
TEXT.French: [CT_NAME], nous avons grand besoin de cela. Je vous pense suffisamment sage pour nous donner ce que nous demandons.
TEXT.German: [CT_NAME], wir brauchen das dringend. Ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr weise genug seid, um uns zu geben, was wir wollen.
TEXT.Italian: [CT_NAME], we have dire need of this. I trust you are wise enough to give us what we want.
TEXT.Spanish: [CT_NAME], tenemos una gran necesidad de esto. Estimo que sois lo suficientemente sabio para darnos lo que queremos.

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I wonder if you could be persuaded to aid us with this small matter?
TEXT.French: Salutations, [CT_NAME]. Je me demandais, pourrions-nous vous persuader de nous aider avec ce petit quelque chose?
TEXT.German: Seid gegrüßt, [CT_NAME]. Wärt Ihr vielleicht bereit, uns mit einigen unbedeutenden Dingen zu unterstützen?
TEXT.Italian: Greetings, [CT_NAME]. I wonder if you could be persuaded to aid us with this small matter?
TEXT.Spanish: Saludos, [CT_NAME]. ¿Me preguntaba si podríamos persuadiros para ayudarnos con esta pequeña materia?

TEXT.English: One more reason to cheer when the end takes you.
TEXT.French: Une raison de plus de se réjouir lorsque la fin vous emportera.
TEXT.German: Ein Grund mehr, Euer Ende zu bejubeln.
TEXT.Italian: One more reason to cheer when the end takes you.
TEXT.Spanish: *Suspiro*. Una razón más para alegrarse cuando el final os alcance.

TEXT.English: "The end will come, even if we do not bring it. Your own actions attest to that. Even in destroying us, you help achieve our goal."
TEXT.French: "La fin viendra, même si nous n'en seront pas le messager. Vos propres actions l'attestent. Même en nous anéantissant, vous nous aidez à accomplir notre but."
TEXT.German: "Das Ende wird kommen, auch wenn wir es nicht sind, die es herbeiführen. Eure eigenen Taten bekräftigen dies. Selbst durch unsere Vernichtung, helft Ihr mit, unser Ziel zu erreichen."
TEXT.Italian: "The end will come, even if we do not bring it. Your own actions attest to that. Even in destroying us, you help achieve our goal."
TEXT.Spanish: "The end will come, even if we do not bring it. Your own actions attest to that. Even in destroying us, you help achieve our goal."

TEXT.English: I have refused the demands of the gods themselves, why do you believe I would bear your yoke?
TEXT.French: J'ai refusé les requêtes des Dieux eux-mêmes, pourquoi croyez-vous que je supporterais votre joug ?
TEXT.German: Ich habe selbst die Forderungen der Götter abgelehnt, warum glaubt Ihr, ich würde mir Euer Joch anlegen lassen?
TEXT.Italian: I have refused the demands of the gods themselves, why do you believe I would bear your yoke.
TEXT.Spanish: He rechazado las demandas de los mismísimos dioses, ¿por qué creéis que soportaría vuestra broma?.

TEXT.English: The shadow of death covers your lands. The Sidar have come to end you.
TEXT.French: L'ombre de la Mort couvre vos terres. Les Sidars sont venus pour en finir avec vous.
TEXT.German: Der Schatten des Todes bedeckt Eure Lande. Die Sidar beenden nun Eure Herrschaft.
TEXT.Italian: The shadow of death covers your lands. The Sidar have come to end you.
TEXT.Spanish: La sombra de la muerte cubre vuestras tierras. Los Sidar han venido para acabar con vosotros.

TEXT.English: You must have keen eyes to spot the Sidar for many times have we walked through your lands unnoticed.
TEXT.French: Vous devez avoir l'œil perçant pour avoir repéré les Sidars, car bien souvent nous traversons vos terres sans être aperçus.
TEXT.German: Ihr müsst einen geübten Blick haben, wenn Ihr die Sidar finden könnt. Wir gehen normalerweise ungesehen ein und aus.
TEXT.Italian: You must have keen eyes to spot the Sidar for many times have we walked through your lands unnoticed.
TEXT.Spanish: Debéis tener ojos agudos para localizar a los Sidar, pues muchas veces hemos caminado por vuestras tierras sin ser vistos.

TEXT.English: We have nothing to learn from you, [CT_NAME]. You merely repeat the same lines I've heard from your people for generations.
TEXT.French: Nous n'avons rien à apprendre de vous, [CT_NAME]. Vous répétez bêtement les mêmes choses que j'ai entendues de votre peuple depuis des générations.
TEXT.German: Wir haben nichts von Euch zu lernen, [CT_NAME]. Ihr wiederholt lediglich dieselben Reden, die ich von Eurem Volk schon seit Generationen höre.
TEXT.Italian: We have nothing to learn from you, [CT_NAME]. You merely repeat the same lines I've heard from your people for generations.
TEXT.Spanish: No tenemos nada que aprender de vos, [CT_NAME]. Meramente repetís las mismas líneas que he oído de la gente de otras generaciones.

TEXT.English: All done? Good, then we shall return. There is much to discover, and it takes much concentration to remain in this world.
TEXT.French: C'est bon ? Bien, nous nous en retournons. Il y a beaucoup à découvrir, et cela demande beaucoup de concentration pour se maintenir dans ce monde.
TEXT.German: Alles erledigt? Gut, dann sollten wir heimkehren. Es gibt viel zu entdecken, und es braucht viel Konzentration, um in dieser Welt zu bleiben.
TEXT.Italian: All done? Good, then we shall return. There is much to discover, and it takes much concentration to remain in this world.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Todo hecho? Bien, entonces volveremos. Hay mucho que descubrir, y lleva mucha concentración permanecer en este mundo.

TEXT.English: This conquest is a novel experience for Sidar. We cannot stop now.
TEXT.French: La conquête est une expérience inédite pour les Sidars. Nous ne pouvons arrêter maintenant.
TEXT.German: Dieses Kräftemessen ist etwas Neues für die Sidar. Wir können es jetzt nicht beenden.
TEXT.Italian: This conquest is a novel experience for Sidar. We cannot stop now.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta conquista es una nueva experiencia para los Sidar. No podemos parar ahora.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME]? I'm glad you are still around. Our friends tend to die off before we Sidar notice.
TEXT.French: [CT_NAME] ? Je suis heureux que vous soyez toujours là. Nos amis tendent à mourir les uns après les autres avant que les Sidars le remarquent.
TEXT.German: [CT_NAME]? Schön das es Euch noch gibt. Unsere Freunde sterben meist, bevor wir sie begrüßen können.
TEXT.Italian: [CT_NAME]? I'm glad you are still around. Our friends tend to die off before we Sidar notice.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿[CT_NAME]? Me agrada que aún estéis por aquí. Nuestros amigos tienden a fallecer antes de que nosotros los Sidar nos demos cuenta.

TEXT.English: We will live to see your demise, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Nous vivrons pour voir votre mort, [CT_NAME]
TEXT.German: Wir werden noch Zeuge Eures Untergangs sein, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: We will live to see your demise, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: Viviremos para presenciar vuestro fallecimiento, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: This deal will do, for a time, though all things pass... except us, of course.
TEXT.French: Ce marché fera l'affaire, pour un temps, bien que tout passe... sauf nous, évidemment.
TEXT.German: Der Handel ist gut, zumindest für den Moment, denn alles vergeht... außer uns natürlich.
TEXT.Italian: This deal will do, for a time, though all things pass... except us, of course.
TEXT.Spanish: Este trato servirá, por un tiempo, pues las cosas vienen y van... excepto nosotros, claro.

TEXT.English: Ah, yes, jealousy. I had forgotten its hold upon the living.
TEXT.French: Ah, oui, la jalousie. J'avais oublié qu'elle avait prise sur les vivants.
TEXT.German: Ah, ja, die Eifersucht. Ich hatte ihre weite Verbreitung unter den Lebenden vergessen.
TEXT.Italian: Ah, yes, jealousy. I had forgotten its hold upon the living.
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, sí, celos. Había olvidado que se encuentra entre los vivos.

TEXT.English: Do you think we are unable to fulfill the threat I implied? Sidar are all around us, even now. You see, but do not perceive.
TEXT.French: Pensez-vous que nous ne pouvons mettre à exécution nos menaces voilées? Les Sidars sont tout autour de nous, même maintenant. Vous voyez, mais ne percevez pas.
TEXT.German: Glaubt Ihr, der versteckten Drohung fehlt es an Substanz? Sidar sind hier überall, auch in diesem Augenblick. Ihr seht zwar, aber Ihr bemerkt uns nicht.
TEXT.Italian: Do you think we are unable to fulfill the threat I implied? Sidar are all around us, even now. You see, but do not perceive.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Creéis que no somos capaces de cumplir la amenaza que insinué? Los Sidar están entre todos nosotros, incluso ahora. Véis, pero no percibís.

TEXT.English: "So, this is what death truly tastes like. What did we fear it for? What a release, at last!"
TEXT.French: "Ainsi est-ce le vrai goût de la mort. Pourquoi l'avons-nous crainte ? Quelle libération, finalement!"
TEXT.German: "Also, so schmeckt der Tod wirklich. Warum haben wir ihn nur gefürchtet? Was für eine Erleichterung, endlich!"
TEXT.Italian: "So, this is what death truly tastes like. What did we fear it for? What a release, at last!"
TEXT.Spanish: "So, this is what death truly tastes like. What did we fear it for? What a release, at last!"

TEXT.English: Diplomacy is a slow and subtle dance. We prefer a faster tempo.
TEXT.French: La diplomatie est une danse lente et subtile. Nous préférons une rythme plus rapide.
TEXT.German: Diplomatie gleicht einem trägen und spitzfindigen Tanz. Wir bevorzugen mehr Tempo.
TEXT.Italian: Diplomacy is a slow and subtle dance. We prefer a faster tempo.
TEXT.Spanish: La diplomacia es una danza lenta y sutil. Preferimos un ritmo más rápido.

TEXT.English: Do not listen to the stories spread to discredit us; we don't betray and kill ALL of our allies.
TEXT.French: N'écoutez pas les ragots répandus pour nous discréditer ; nous ne trahissons pas ni ne tuons TOUS nos alliés.
TEXT.German: Gebt nichts auf Gerüchte und Tratsch... Nein, wir sind keine Verräter und wir töten auch nicht JEDEN unserer Verbündeten.
TEXT.Italian: Do not listen to the stories spread to discredit us; we don't betray and kill ALL of our allies.
TEXT.Spanish: No escuchéis las historias diseminadas para desacreditarnos; nosotros no traicionamos y matamos a TODOS nuestros aliados.

TEXT.English: Scurry along back to whatever hovel you dwell in.
TEXT.French: Détalez dans n'importe quel taudis où vous vous terrez.
TEXT.German: Husch, husch, zurück in das Loch, aus dem Ihr gekrochen seid!
TEXT.Italian: Scurry along back to whatever hovel you dwell in.
TEXT.Spanish: Corred a toda prisa de vuelta a cualquiera que sea la casucha en la que moráis.

TEXT.English: Yes, we are locked into eternal bonds of peace, dear [CT_NAME]. You can bet your life on it.
TEXT.French: Oui, nous sommes prisonniers des liens éternels de la paix, cher [CT_NAME]. Vous pouvez parier votre vie là-dessus.
TEXT.German: Ja, wir sind nun durch ewige Bande des Friedens verbunden, mein lieber [CT_NAME]. Ihr könnt Euer Leben darauf verwetten.
TEXT.Italian: Yes, we are locked into eternal bonds of peace, dear [CT_NAME]. You can bet your life on it.
TEXT.Spanish: Sí, estamos atrapados en los eternos huesos de la paz, querido [CT_NAME]. Podéis dedicar vuestra vida en ella.

TEXT.English: You shall have peace. The peace of the grave.
TEXT.French: Vous aurez la paix. La paix de la tombe.
TEXT.German: Ihr bekommt Euren Frieden. Den Frieden des Grabes.
TEXT.Italian: You shall have peace. The peace of the grave.
TEXT.Spanish: Tendréis la paz. La paz de la sepultura.

TEXT.English: You are wise to keep us close.
TEXT.French: Vous êtes sage de nous garder proche.
TEXT.German: Euch an uns zu binden, zeugt von Verstand.
TEXT.Italian: You are wise to keep us close.
TEXT.Spanish: Sóis sabio al permanecer cercano a nosotros.

TEXT.English: Twelve assassins loyal to me reside in your palace alone. Get to the point and make it worth my while.
TEXT.French: Douze assassins loyaux envers moi résident séparément dans vos palais. Venez-en au fait et ne soyez pas en reste.
TEXT.German: Zwölf meiner loyalen Meuchler befinden sich allein in Eurem Palast. Kommt zum Punkt, es sollte sich besser lohnen.
TEXT.Italian: Twelve assassins loyal to me reside in your palace alone. Get to the point and make it worth my while.
TEXT.Spanish: Sólo en vuestro palacio residen doce asesinos leales a mí. Id al grano y haced que haya merecido mi tiempo.

TEXT.English: Well, I suppose trade is quicker than theft, though I fear my reflexes dulling.
TEXT.French: Bien, je suppose que le commerce est plus rapide que le vol, même si je craigne que mes réflexes s'émoussent.
TEXT.German: Ich denke, ein Handel funktioniert schneller als Diebstahl, obwohl ich fürchte, dass meine Reflexe langsam nachlassen.
TEXT.Italian: Well, I suppose trade is quicker than theft, though I fear my reflexes dulling.
TEXT.Spanish: Bueno, supongo que el comercio es más rápido que el robo, aunque me temo que mis reflexiones son tediosas.

TEXT.English: We have academies dedicated to the art of persuasion, you lack the talent to even qualify for entrance.
TEXT.French: Nous avons des académies dédiées à l'art de la persuasion, mais il vous manque même le talent pour vous y inscrire.
TEXT.German: Wir haben ganze Akademien, die die Kunst der Überzeugung lehren. Ihr habt nicht mal genung Talent, um sie auch nur zu betreten.
TEXT.Italian: We have academies dedicated to the art of persuasion, you lack the talent to even qualify for entrance.
TEXT.Spanish: Tenemos academias dedicadas al arte de la persuasión, y vos incluso carecéis del talento necesario para ingresar.

TEXT.English: This is not the respect one shows their betters, [CT_NAME]. I had thought you knew your place in the world.
TEXT.French: Ce n'est pas le respect que l'on doit à ses supérieurs, [CT_NAME]. J'aurais cru que vous connaîtriez votre place dans le monde.
TEXT.German: Ihr behandelt uns nicht mit dem gebührenden Respekt, [CT_NAME]. Ich dachte, das Ihr um Euren Platz in dieser Welt wisst.
TEXT.Italian: This is not the respect one shows their betters, [CT_NAME]. I had thought you knew your place in the world.
TEXT.Spanish: Este no es el respeto que se debe mostrar hacia los superiores, [CT_NAME]. Pensaba que conocíais vuestro lugar en el mundo.

TEXT.English: How long does it take you to prepare for war? The Svartalfar are always ready, and you are set to give us cause as well.
TEXT.French: Combien de temps vous faut-il pour être sur le pied de guerre ? Les Svartalfars sont toujours prêts, et vous faites tout pour nous donner une raison.
TEXT.German: Wie lang braucht Ihr für die Kriegsvorbereitungen? Wir Svartalfar sind allzeit bereit, und Ihr werdet uns wohl auch den Grund liefern.
TEXT.Italian: How long does it take you to prepare for war? The Svartalfar are always ready, and you are set to give us cause as well.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Cuánto tiempo os llevaría prepararos para la guerra? Svartalfar siempre está preparada, y vos estáis a punto de darnos un pretexto.

TEXT.English: You have slipped from my web. Why don't you retreat while I spin another?
TEXT.French: Vous avez glissé hors de ma toile. Pourquoi ne vous retireriez-vous pas pendant que j'en tisse une autre ?
TEXT.German: Ihr seid aus meinem Netz entkommen. Warum zieht ihr Euch nicht zurück, während ich ein weiteres spinne?
TEXT.Italian: You have slipped from my web. Why don't you retreat while I spin another?
TEXT.Spanish: Habéis logrado escapar de mi red. ¿Por qué no os retiráis mientras yo tejo otra?

TEXT.English: Hmm. Unpleasant as it is to admit, even you have your uses.
TEXT.French: Hmmm... Aussi déplaisant que ce soit à admettre, même vous avez votre utilité.
TEXT.German: Hmm. Ihr seid wohl doch von Nutzen, so ungern wir es auch zugeben.
TEXT.Italian: Hmm. Unpleasant as it is to admit, even you have your uses.
TEXT.Spanish: Mmm. Odio admitirlo, pero incluso vos tenéis vuestra utilidad.

TEXT.English: It is our right to rule all lesser beasts. Perhaps you could persuade me to look elsewhere at the moment with this.
TEXT.French: Il est de notre droit de rêgner sur les créatures inférieures. Peut être pourriez-vous me persuader détourner le regard pour l'instant avec ceci.
TEXT.German: Es ist unser Recht, alle niederen Lebewesen zu unterwerfen. Vielleicht lenkt mich dies eine Weile von Eurem Land ab.
TEXT.Italian: It is our right to rule all lesser beasts. Perhaps you could persuade me to look elsewhere at the moment with this.
TEXT.Spanish: Es nuestro derecho dominar a todas las bestias inferiores. Quizás podáis persuadirme para mirar a otra parte de momento con esto.

TEXT.English: You are not Svartalfar, [CT_NAME]. We recognize no claim of yours. Yield this at once.
TEXT.French: Vous n'êtes pas Svartalfar, [CT_NAME]. Nous ne tenons pas compte de vos revendications. Donnez nous ceci maintenant.
TEXT.German: Ihr seid kein Svartalfar, [CT_NAME]. Wir erkennen Euren Besitzanspruch nicht an. Übergebt dies sofort!
TEXT.Italian: You are not Svartalfar, [CT_NAME]. We recognize no claim of yours. Yield this at once.
TEXT.Spanish: No sois Svartalfar, [CT_NAME]. No reconocemos ninguna de vuestras reivindicaciones. Rendid esto inmediatamente.

TEXT.English: You think I am beaten? Apparently you've never seen a cornered panther before.
TEXT.French: Vous croyez que je suis battu ? Apparemment vous n'avez jamais vu de panthère acculée auparavant.
TEXT.German: Ihr meint, ich sei geschlagen? Sicher habt Ihr noch nie einen Panther in Bedrängnis erlebt.
TEXT.Italian: You think I am beaten? Apparently you've never seen a cornered panther before.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Creéis que estoy abatida? Aparentemente nunca antes habéis visto a una pantera arrinconada.

TEXT.English: You would presume to deny me? The Winter Queen? You are no longer amusing.
TEXT.French: Vous prétendez vouloir me le refuser? À moi, La Reine de l'Hiver? Vous ne m'amusez plus.
TEXT.German: Ihr erdreistet Euch einer Zurückweisung? Gegenüber mir, der Königin des Winters? Ihr seid nicht länger unterhaltsam.
TEXT.Italian: You would presume to deny me? The Winter Queen? You are no longer amusing.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Osaríais presumir denegarmelo? ¿A la Reina del Invierno? Ya no me resultáis entretenido.

TEXT.English: "You think you got the last of us? Truly, you are as blind as I believed. We will always be in the forests, lurking, waiting to return."
TEXT.French: "Vous croyez que vous nous avez tous eus ? Vraiment, vous êtes aussi aveugle que je le croyais. Nous serons toujours dans les forêts, tapis, attendant de revenir."
TEXT.German: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr hättet jeden von uns erwischt? Wahrlich, Ihr seid so blind, wie ich es vermutet hatte. Wir werden immer in den Wäldern sein, lauernd, und darauf wartend, zurückzukehren."
TEXT.Italian: "You think you got the last of us? Truly, you are as blind as I believed. We will always be in the forests, lurking, waiting to return."
TEXT.Spanish: "You think you got the last of us? Truly, you are as blind as I believed. We will always be in the forests, lurking, waiting to return."

TEXT.English: Mulcarn's ice didn't stop me and neither shall your steel. My return is merely delayed once more.
TEXT.French: La glace de Mulcarn ne m'a pas stoppé et votre acier ne réussira pas davantage. Une fois encore, mon retour n'en est que retardé.
TEXT.German: Mulcarns Eis hat mich nicht aufgehalten und das wird auch Eurem Stahl nicht gelingen. Meine Rückkehr ist nun leider etwas verschoben worden.
TEXT.Italian: Mulcarn's ice didn't stop me and neither shall your steel. My return is merely delayed once more.
TEXT.Spanish: Mulcarn's ice didn't stop me and neither shall your steel. My return is merely delayed once more.
